fields.name: Learn Knowledge (Passive)
fields.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you or an enemy is granted with a beneficial effect. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Gain Knowledge (Passive)
fields.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you're granted with a beneficial effect. Gains 3 Knowledge when an enemy or an ally gets defeated. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Gain Knowledge (Passive)
fields.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you're granted with a beneficial effect. Gains 3 Knowledge when an enemy or an ally gets defeated. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Learn Knowledge (Passive)
fields.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you or an enemy is granted with a beneficial effect. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Gain Knowledge (Passive)
fields.description: Gains Knowledge by the number of granted beneficial effects when you're granted with a beneficial effect. Gains 3 Knowledge when an enemy or an ally gets defeated. You can have up to 5 Knowledge. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Forbidden Galdr
fields.description: Decreases the current HP of the enemy target (bosses excluded) by 10% for every Knowledge you have. If you have 5 Knowledge, decreases the target's MAX HP by 50% instead. After that, heals all allies by the decreased HP. This skill can be used when you have at least 1 Knowledge, and all Knowledge will be consumed once you use the skill.

fields.name: Start of Apocalypse
fields.description: Attacks the enemies in the order of low HP ratio to high HP ratio by the number of Knowledge you have, and the damage increases as you attack. If you have 5 Knowledge, destroys the enemy's MAX HP by 50% of the damage dealt. This skill can be used when you have at least 1 Knowledge, and all Knowledge will be consumed once you use the skill.

fields.name: Legacy of Knowledge (Passive)
fields.description: Attacks the enemy while ignoring the enemy's Defense by 15% for every Knowledge you have whenever you attack. If you have 5 Knowledge, uses all of your Knowledge to attack while ignoring the enemy's Defense. In addition, if you get defeated while having Knowledge, you will use all of your Knowledge to be revived with 20% HP per Knowledge used. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Eye of Pioneer (Passive)
fields.description: If an ally is attacked by an enemy, uses one of your Knowledge to heal the ally by 35% of the damage received. If you have 5 Knowledge, the ally will be healed by 70% of the damage received. [Automatic Effect]

fields.name: Endless Desire
fields.description: Absorbs 25% of your Attack Power and Defense per Knowledge from the enemy target's Attack Power and Defense. In addition, if you have 5 Knowledge, steals all beneficial effects granted on the enemy and instantly gains another turn. This skill can be used when you have at least 1 Knowledge, and all Knowledge will be consumed once you use the skill. (Accumulates up to 10 times)

fields.name: Increase ATK
fields.description: Attack Power is increased by 50%

fields.name: Increase DEF
fields.description: Defense is increased by 70%

fields.name: Increase CRI Rate
fields.description: Critical Hit Rate is increased by 30%

fields.name: Increase CRI Resist
fields.description: Critical Hit Rate against the monster is reduced by 50%

fields.name: Increase SPD
fields.description: SPD is increased by 33%

fields.name: Recovery
fields.description: 15% of max HP is healed for every turn this is active

fields.name: Counter
fields.description: Counterattacks when attacked

fields.name: Revenge
fields.description: Counterattacks when an ally is attacked with 50% chance

fields.name: Immunity
fields.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects

fields.name: Invincible
fields.description: All incoming damage is reduced to zero

fields.name: Reflect DMG
fields.description: 33% of incoming damage is reflected back at the attacker. This does not nullify any Status Effects.

fields.name: Shield
fields.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

fields.name: Endure
fields.description: Monster temporarily cannot be killed as HP cannot go below 1

fields.name: Defend
fields.description: Monster that applies Hug will take damage from monster with effect. Does not protect against debuffs.

fields.name: Protect Soul
fields.description: If the monster dies with the effect active, it will revive

fields.name: Increase ATB
fields.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

fields.name: Glancing Hit
fields.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

fields.name: Decrease ATK
fields.description: Attack Power is reduced by 50%

fields.name: Decrease DEF
fields.description: Defense is reduced by 70%

fields.name: Decrease SPD
fields.description: Speed is reduced by 33%

fields.name: Beneficial Effects Blocked
fields.description: Buffs cannot be applied to the monster

fields.name: Bomb
fields.description: A bomb is planted on a monster, which is set to detonate in a fixed amount of turns. The damage inflicted is proportional to the enemy monster's attack. When the bomb detonates, affected monsters are stunned for 1 turn.

fields.name: Provoke
fields.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

fields.name: Sleep
fields.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

fields.name: Continuous DMG
fields.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

fields.name: Freeze
fields.description: Enemy is frozen and immobilized for a number of turns

fields.name: Stun
fields.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

fields.name: Disturb HP Recovery
fields.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

fields.name: Silence
fields.description: Skills with cooltime are blocked for a number of turns

fields.name: Brand
fields.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

fields.name: Oblivious
fields.description: Prevents passives from functioning

fields.name: Decrease ATB
fields.description: Reduces the enemy's attack gauge

fields.name: Cleanse
fields.description: Removes one or more debuffs

fields.name: Heal
fields.description: Increases ally's HP

fields.name: Revive
fields.description: Revive a dead ally

fields.name: Remove Buff
fields.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

fields.name: Ignore DEF
fields.description: Attack will ignore the target's defense.

fields.name: Additional Turn
fields.description: Gain another turn immediately

fields.name: AOE
fields.description: Applies skill to more than one target

fields.name: Detonate Bomb
fields.description: Detonate all bomb effects on the enemy target(s)

fields.name: Steal Buff
fields.description: Remove a beneficial effect and take it for yourself

fields.name: Reduce Cooltime
fields.description: Reduces cool down counter of skills by 1 or more

fields.name: Increase Cooltime
fields.description: Puts the target's skill on cool down.

fields.name: Self-Heal
fields.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

fields.name: Multiple Hits
fields.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

fields.name: Auto Effect
fields.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

fields.name: Anti-Revive
fields.description: Prevents an enemy from being resurrected after being killed.

fields.name: Transfer Debuff
fields.description: Removes a debuff from casting monster and applies it to the target monster.

fields.name: Additional Attack
fields.description: Attacks an additional time on the same turn.

fields.name: Increase Buff Duration
fields.description: Increases the duration of a buff by a number of turns.

fields.name: Decrease Debuff Duration
fields.description: Decreases the duration of debuffs by a number of turns.

fields.name: Self-Harm
fields.description: Deals damage to the monster using the skill.

fields.name: Elemental Advantage
fields.description: The skill always has an elemental advantage regardless of monster elements.

fields.name: Ally Attack
fields.description: Brings one or more allies to attack at the same time.

fields.name: Destroy HP
fields.description: Destroys the enemy's MAX HP

fields.name: Team Attack
fields.description: Attacks with one or more teammates

fields.name: Decrease Damage
fields.description: Decreases damage received by a certain amount

fields.name: Increase Debuff Duration
fields.description: Increases the duration of one or more debuffs on the enemy

fields.name: Reduce incoming DMG
fields.description: Reduce incoming DMG by a certain amount.

fields.name: Redistribute HP
fields.description: Redistribute HP

fields.name: Prevent Resurrect
fields.description: Prevent the enemy from being resurrected.

fields.name: Threat
fields.description: The enemy can only attack the target under the Threat state when using the attack skill.

fields.name: Ignore Damage Reduction
fields.description: Ignores damage reduction effects

fields.name: Guaranteed Critical Hit
fields.description: Attack will always land as a Critical Hit

fields.name: Debuff Bonus Damage

fields.name: Decrease Buff Duration

fields.name: Ignore Resistance
fields.description: Bypasses all enemy resistances when applying effects.

fields.name: Gain Knowledge
fields.description: Stacks up to 5. Provides extra power to skills with more Knowledge stacked.

fields.name: Magic Power Explosion
fields.description: Monster is uncontrollable and dies when this effect expires

fields.name: Spend Knowledge
fields.description: Consumes all stacks of Knowledge

fields.name: World Boss
fields.description: A server wide boss that is unlocked after completing a Dimensional Rift. Rewards are random and the number of rewards is based on the rank you achieve.
